requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 750ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: i5-2500 3.30 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 780 GTX or AMD Radeon Radeon R7 260X series card or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5 8th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics620
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
  • Additional Notes: Please wear headphones and use keyboard. Steam Deck and controllers are not supported.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 4800H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
  • Additional Notes: Please wear headphones and use keyboard. Steam Deck and controllers are not supported.
